import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './ItemCard.css' import { useState } from 'react' import { useFetch } from '../../Utils/useFetch' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' export const ItemCard = ( { category, id, thumbnail, title, brand, price, rating } ) =>{ const { addToCart } = useContext(ShopContext) return(

{category}

{title}

{brand}

R$: {price},00

Avaliação: {rating}

) }
